titles.title: Providing for an adjournment or recess of the two Houses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 376 - 40 (Roll no. 457).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 8/1/2003--Passed Senate amended. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from the legislative day of July 29, 2003, until September 3, 2003, and a recess or an adjournment of the Senate from any day on July 25 through August 4, 2003, until September 2, 2003.
